nodes.text: Skar was a Dark Jedi who resided on Mustafar near Berken's Flow during the Galactic Civil War. She held a piece of a tablet sought by Epo Qetora. An unknown spacer was then asked by Epo Qetora to retrieve this tablet, in which the spacer defeated her.

Skar appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
